function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-representative sample due to geographic and demographic imbalance","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of Italian population, limiting generalizability of findings","Mitigation":"Use stratified sampling to ensure representation of diverse geographic and demographic groups","Technologies":"Stratified sampling techniques, geographic information systems (GIS)","People":"Italian population, survey participants","Owner":"Research team, survey organizers"},{"Description":"Self-selection bias in online survey due to technology use","Impact":"Underrepresentation of individuals less prone to use smartphones or e-mail, affecting survey response rate","Mitigation":"Use multi-mode surveys to reach non-smartphone and non-e-mail users, provide alternative survey formats","Technologies":"Multi-mode survey platforms, paper-based surveys, phone interviews","People":"Non-smartphone and non-e-mail users, survey participants","Owner":"Research team, survey organizers"},{"Description":"Lack of internationally validated measuring instruments for psychological health outcomes","Impact":"Risk of unreliable data and limited comparability with international studies","Mitigation":"Validate measuring instruments for psychological health outcomes, collaborate with experts for instrument validation","Technologies":"Psychological measurement validation tools, collaboration platforms for experts","People":"Study participants, research team","Owner":"Research team, collaborating experts"}]}
